description: This table stores miscellaneous communication devices that can be used to reach the patient.  Examples are mobile phone and pager.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the patient record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: OTHER_COMMUNIC_C_NAME
columns.description:
Other communication devices such as: 1) MOBILE: Mobile 2) PAGER: Pager 3) HOME FAX: Home Fax 4) OTH FAX: Other Fax 5) ASTNT: Assistant 6) TTY/TDP: TTY/TDP 7) HOME PH: Home Phone 8) WORK PH: Work Phone


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Mobile


Pager


Home Fax


Other Fax


Assistant


TTY


Home Phone


Work Phone


Video Phone

columns.name: OTHER_COMMUNIC_NUM
columns.description: Different kinds of communication numbers such as Home Phone, Work Phone, Fax, Pager, etc, that correspond to the type of device stored in OTHER_COMMUNIC_C.

columns.name: START_DAY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The beginning day for the date range that this phone number is valid.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Sunday


Monday


Tuesday


Wednesday


Thursday


Friday


Saturday

columns.name: END_DAY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The end day for the date range that this phone number is valid.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: START_DAY_C_NAME

columns.name: START_TIME
columns.description: The beginning time for the time range that this phone number is valid.

columns.name: END_TIME
columns.description: The end time for the time range that this phone number is valid.

columns.name: CONTACT_PRIORITY
columns.description: Priorities are numbers, and are used to set a calling preference for phone numbers.  1 is the highest priority.

columns.name: CONTACT_NOTES
columns.description: Notes associated with this phone/contact number.
